{{Wired embedded system |brand=Planex |model=BRL-04 |revision=CW-U |ean=4941250161768 |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=RG-03 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router, print server |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8650B |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29AL016M90TFI02 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, (38400 8N1) |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=μClinux;2.4.26-uc0; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=00:90:CC }} {{TagLine|4Port Ethernet Broadband Router w/ USB Print Server}} :[https://www.planex.co.jp/product/router/brl-04cw-u/ Product page] (JP) • [http://www.planex.co.jp/support/download/router/brl-04cw-u.shtml Downloads] • [http://www.planex.co.jp/support/pdf/BRL-04CW-U_QIG_v1.0.pdf QIG] (JP) *[http://mizupc8.bio.mie-u.ac.jp/pukiwiki/?Planex%2FBRL-04CW-U Specifications and more info (boot log) on ''mizupc8.bio.mie-u.ac.jp/pukiwiki''] :*[[Realtek]] RTL8650B SoC :*2 MB Flash (''[[Spansion]]'' S29AL016M90TFI02) :*16 MB RAM (''[[Hynix]]'' HY57V281620ETP-H) :*''Alpha'' board text of ''8RG03....0B1G'' :May be near identical to the BRL-04UR, see also [http://www.fenix.ne.jp/~thomas/memo/brl-04ur/index.html ''Hack BRL-04UR''] Additional specifications, per ''[[Planex]]'''s product page, follow... *Power: 5 VDC *Dimensions (H x D x W): [[Dimensions::159 mm x 101 mm x 34 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::240g]] ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Boot log copied from the above wiki • >> |
